zh.title: Solana/美元技术分析：[短期调整，关注关键支撑位]
zh.content:
当前，SOL/USD在122.05附近交易，近期的24小时变化为-0.80%。从高点123.95回落至低点121.67，表明市场出现了一定的调整压力。短期内，价格走势呈现出震荡整理的趋势，接下来需要关注是否能维持在121.67的支撑位之上。

技术指标方面，MACD处于负值-1.14694，显示出空头力量较强，市场情绪偏向于看空。虽然RSI(14)数据缺失，但结合当前价格走势，可以推测市场存在超卖的可能性，若RSI进一步下跌，可能会形成反弹的机会。投资者需密切留意MACD的变化，以判断市场趋势的转变。

在支撑与阻力方面，121.67是关键支撑位，如果价格突破该水平，则可能会测试118.50的次级支撑。上方阻力在SMA(20)的127.145附近，若价格突破该水平，可能会重新回到上涨通道。投资者应关注这两个水平，以制定相应的交易策略。

综上所述，短期内SOL/USD面临调整压力，建议投资者在121.67支撑位附近寻找买入机会，若反弹至127.145附近则考虑获利了结。保持灵活的交易策略，结合市场动态及时调整仓位，将有助于降低风险。

en.title: Solana vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Solana (SOL) against the US Dollar stands at 122.05, reflecting a slight decline of 0.80% over the past 24 hours. This downturn follows a recent peak of 123.95, suggesting that the market is facing resistance at this level. The low of 121.67 indicates potential support, which could serve as a crucial threshold for buyers. If SOL fails to maintain above this support level, further declines could ensue, potentially testing lower support levels.

Analyzing the technical indicators, the MACD reading of -1.14694 suggests bearish momentum, indicating that the selling pressure may persist in the short term. Additionally, without the RSI(14) value available, it is crucial to monitor for any overbought or oversold conditions that could emerge in the coming days. Meanwhile, the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at 127.14500 remains above the current price, reinforcing the bearish sentiment and indicating a possible downward trend if prices remain below this average.

Traders should be cautious and consider positioning themselves strategically. A strong break below 121.67 could trigger further selling, opening the door to new lows, while a rally past 123.95 would necessitate a reassessment of the current trend. It may prove beneficial to set limit buy orders around the support level to capitalize on potential rebounds, while also considering stop-loss orders to manage risk in case of a downward breakout.

In summary, while Solana is currently facing bearish pressure, the key levels of 121.67 and 123.95 will dictate future movements. Monitoring the MACD for shifts towards positive territory, along with observing price action relative to the 20-day SMA, will be imperative for making informed trading decisions in the coming sessions.
